title: Deutsche Bank named Best Global Flow House in Euromoney Awards for Excellence 2015
body:
Deutsche Bank received seven accolades at the Euromoney Awards for Excellence 2015, including the top-tier global award: Best Global Flow House. Other wins included Best Transaction Services House in Western Europe, Best Investment Bank in Germany, Ireland and Poland as well as Best Risk House in Central and Eastern Europe and Best Equity House in India.
“These awards are a further demonstration of our commitment to being a global leader in investment banking. We encourage all employees to maintain the outstanding service our clients expect and continue earning their trust by placing them at the core of our organization." said Colin Fan and Jeff Urwin, Co-Heads of CB&S.
Euromoney’s Awards for Excellence recognise institutions that demonstrate leadership, innovation and momentum in global financial markets. The accolades cover more than 20 global product categories and include best-in-class awards in all regions and recognitions for the best banks in close to 100 countries. 
“We are honoured to receive an award that has evidenced the unrivalled strength of our transaction services in Western Europe for the past seven years. Our client-centric approach, stable business model and innovative solutions, combined with powerful execution and excellent client service, continues to set us apart from the competition.” said Werner Steinmüller, Head of Global Transaction Banking.
